short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful automatic error tracking for software developers. Resolve bugs faster, saving time and keeping customers happy with Raygun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raygun integrates with your software and reports on software errors, impacted users and more. All in real-time. See why thousands of developers trust Raygun to help them deliver the most rock solid software around.

Taking literally only a few minutes to integrate, Raygun has first class support for all popular programming languages and platforms: Ruby, Node, Java, C#, iOS, Android, Xamarin, Go, PHP, ColdFusion and many more.

Raygun will intelligently group your software crashes, notify you of the problems and give you the depth of information to fix software bugs fast.

Developers can attach custom data and tags to any error. Version tracking helps ensure you're keeping an eye only on the most recent problems. User tracking gives you the power to notify users who have experienced a fault - either to get more information or to tell them you've fixed the issue. Nothing makes users happier than a responsive software developer.

Raygun is team friendly - monitor as many apps as you like and connect as many of your team members as you want. You can even comment on error groups so your team can see what's going on. This helps you see the full life cycle of an issue and how you've responded.

Raygun plays exceptionally well with others & integrates with the developer tools you already use. Connect Raygun crash reports with Jira, YouTrack, GitHub and Sprint.ly work items. Integrate additional notifications through your company HipChat or Campfire accounts. Raygun meshes seamlessly into your development workflow.
